description: गरीबी रेखा के नीचे जीवन यापन करने वाले दिव्यांग व्यक्तियों तथा बौने व्यक्तियों को आर्थिक सहायता प्रदान कर सम्मानपूर्वक जीवन-यापन करने हेतु सहयोग देना।

procedures.step_description: Urban bodies/Gram Panchayats will forward the applications with recommendations to the concerned Janpad Panchayats.
Concerned urban bodies/Janpad Panchayats have the power of approval/rejection.

title: Social Security Pension Scheme

criteria.description: Resident of Chhattisgarh
Disabled children of age group 6-17. Disabled children of age group 6-14 who are not studying will not be eligible.
General disabled person of 18 years or above
Dwarf individuals

description: गरीबी रेखा के नीचे जीवन यापन करने वाली विधवा/परित्यक्त महिलाओं को आर्थिक सहायता प्रदान कर सम्मानपूर्वक जीवन यापन करने हेतु सहयोग देना।

procedures.step_description: Urban bodies/gram panchayats will forward applications with recommendations to the concerned Janpad Panchayats. The concerned urban bodies/Janpad Panchayats have the right to approve/reject.

title: Pleasant Support Scheme

criteria.description: Women aged between 18-39 years.
Deserted women aged 18 years or above

description: गरीबी रेखा के नीचे जीवन यापन करने वाले वृद्धजनों को आर्थिक सहायता प्रदान कर सम्मानपूर्वक जीवन-यापन करने हेतु सहयोग देना।

procedures.step_description: नगरीय निकाय/ग्राम पंचायतें अनुशंसा के साथ आवेदन जनपद पंचायतों को अग्रेषित करेगी। संबंधित नगरीय निकायों/जनपद पंचायतों को स्वीकृति/अस्वीकृति के अधिकार हैं।

title: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme

description: गरीबी रेखा के नीचे जीवन यापन करने वाले विधवाओं को आर्थिक सहायता प्रदान कर सम्मानपूर्वक जीवन-यापन करने हेतु सहयोग देना।

procedures.step_description: नगरीय निकाय/ग्राम पंचायतें अनुशंसा के साथ आवेदन जनपद पंचायतों को अग्रेषित करेगी। संबंधित नगरीय निकायों/जनपद पंचायतों को स्वीकृति/अस्वीकृति के अधिकार हैं।

title: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme

description: गरीबी रेखा के नीचे जीवन यापन करने वाले गंभीर एवं बहु दिव्यांग व्यक्ति को आर्थिक सहायता प्रदान कर सम्मानपूर्वक जीवन-यापन करने हेतु सहयोग देना।

beneficiaries.beneficiary_type: Individuals living below the poverty line with severe and multiple disabilities

procedures.step_description: Urban bodies/Gram Panchayats will forward the application along with recommendation to Janpad Panchayats. The concerned urban bodies/Janpad Panchayats have the power of approval/rejection.

title: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme

description: गरीबी रेखा के नीचे जीवन यापन करने वाले परिवार के ऐसे सदस्य की मृत्यु होने पर जिसकी कमाई से ही अधिकांश परिवार का गुजारा चलता हो, ऐसे परिवार के वारिस मुखिया को आर्थिक सहायता प्रदान करना।

procedures.step_description: नगरीय निकाय/ग्राम पंचायतें अनुशंसा के साथ आवेदन जनपद पंचायतों को अग्रेषित करेगी। संबंधित नगरीय निकायों/जनपद पंचायतों को स्वीकृति/अस्वीकृति के अधिकार हैं।

valid_upto: Information not available in the document
title: National Family Assistance Scheme

criteria.description: गरीबी रेखा के नीचे जीवन यापन करने वाले परिवार के मुखिया की मृत्यु होने पर वारिस मुखिया को आर्थिक सहायता दी जाती है।
मृतक की आयु मृत्यु दिनांक को 18 वर्ष से अधिक तथा 60 वर्ष से कम हो।

description: विभिन्न प्रचार-प्रसार माध्यम से योजना के पक्ष में सकारात्मक वातावरण निर्मित करना।

procedures.step_description: आवेदक को निर्धारित प्रपत्र में आवेदन जिला के संयुक्त संचालक/उप संचालक, पंचायत एवं समाज कल्याण को प्रस्तुत करना होगा।

title: Prohibition Program

description: सांस्कृतिक कार्यक्रम के माध्यम से शासन की जन कल्याणकारी योजनाओं का प्रचार-प्रसार करना |
title: Art Planning Scheme
Loan Scheme Self Employed Disabled Chhattisgarh Disabled Finance And Development Corporation
State Source Disabled Institute And State Resource And Rehabilitation Center

description: Increasing mobility of PwDs by providing artificial limbs / aid to all the eligible disabled persons of the state.

procedures.step_description: Applicants must apply in the prescribed format and must attach medical certificate, income certificate, caste certificate with application form and apply to Joint/Deputy director, Social Welfare department district office,.

title: Potency Development Plan

criteria.description: PwD must be a Disability Certificate / UDID Card holder.
Any type of disability is 40 percent or more.
Be a resident of Chhattisgarh state.
Recommendation of BPL family member or Collector / Sub divisional Officer (Revenue).
Income of parents/guardians of PwDs must be less than 8000/- rupee per month.

description: Increasing mobility by minimizing disabilities of disabled persons.

procedures.step_description: Applications must be submitted in prescribed format with Disability Certificate, Income certificate, Caste certificate to the Joint/Deputy Director, Social Welfare, District Office.

title: Artificial Limbs And Accessories Delivery Plans
funding_pattern: If the income of parents / guardian or himself is 5000 rupees per month, he will receive the instruments free and whose income is between Rs 5001 and Rs 8000, resources are provided by depositing 50 percent of the cost.

criteria.description: PwD must be a Disability Certificate / UDID Card holder.
Any type of disability is 40 percent or more.
Be a resident of Chhattisgarh state.
Recommendation of BPL family member or Collector / Sub divisional Officer (Revenue).

description: Providing assistance and promoting disabled children in education and training.

procedures.step_description: Application will be submitted in the prescribed format, to the District Office of Social Welfare / Janpad Panchayat office through the Head of the institution.

funding_pattern: 150 rupees from 1st to 5th class, 170 rupees from 6th to 8th class, 190 rupees from 9th to 12th class
title: Disabled Scholarship Scheme

criteria.description: Residents of Chhattisgarh
Disability of the person must be of 40% or above
Regular student of school/college/Technical course
Income of parents/guardian must be less than 8000- per month

description:
Grants for teaching of disabled children through voluntary institutions
Running various rehabilitation programs.
Arrangement of institutions under the Juvenile Act.
Running Old Age Home
Promotions related to drug de-addiction
title: Grant Aid Voluntary Organizations Working Area disabled Welfare

criteria.description: Grants for teaching of disabled children through voluntary institutions
Running various rehabilitation programs.
Arrangement of institutions under the Juvenile Act.
Running Old Age Home
Promotions related to drug de-addiction

description: In view of social rehabilitation of \nPwDs lump sum financial assistance are provided after marriage. PwDs who are not \nincome tax payer are eligible under the scheme.

beneficiaries.beneficiary_type: Disabled persons of 40% or more disability.
PwDs must be a non income tax payer.

procedures.step_description: Applicants must submitt their application in prescribed format to Joint/Deputy Director, Social Welfare Deptt of their respective district.

funding_pattern: Lump sum amount of Rs. 50,000 / - if either of the couple is PwD and if both are disabled 1,00,000 / - lump sum amount is provided.
title: Disabled Wedding Incentive Scheme

criteria.description: Age of disabled man must be between age of 21 to 45 years.
Age of disabled woman must be between age of 18 to 45 years.
It must be first marriage of the person.

description: Consultation related to identification, certification and education, training and rehabilitation for PwDs
title: District Rehabilitation District Disabled Rehabilitation Center Scheme

description: Issuance of identity card and passbook by authentication of PwDs.

procedures.step_description: After certification of PwDs by Medical board in the orgaised camp or district hospital, identity card and passbooks are issued to the PwDs (with disability of 40% or above)

title: Deficit Disabilities Rehabilitation Program
Cerebral Palsy Gait Labelles Physical Referral Rehabilitation Center

description:
Early identification of Disability
Cooperation in therapeutic services
Distribution and maintenance of aid and appliances.
Procedure wise assistance for support
Assisting Disabled for education
To create hustle free environment for PwDs.
To assure participation of PwDs in community.
Organizing programmes for demonstration of excellence of PwDs.
To coordinate with various departments at various levels.
Arrangements for rehabilitation of PwDs.

procedures.step_description: By assistance of Viklang Mitan/Multipurpose Rehabilitation Activists, the certified PwDs are benefitted under schemes of various departments.

title: National Integrated Rehabilitation Program

criteria.description: Early identification of Disability
Cooperation in therapeutic services
Distribution and maintenance of aid and appliances.
Procedure wise assistance for support
Assisting Disabled for education
To create hustle free environment for PwDs.
To assure participation of PwDs in community.
Organizing programmes for demonstration of excellence of PwDs.
To coordinate with various departments at various levels.
Arrangements for rehabilitation of PwDs.

description: This scheme aims to improve the living standards and economic prosperity of disabled individuals in Chhattisgarh, promoting inclusivity, empowerment, and social justice.

procedures.step_description: Technical examination of beneficiaries after receiving application in prescribed format-I
Registration of selected beneficiaries on a dedicated portal after verification
District office maintains a register of applications (format-two)

title: Petrol Powered Two Wheeler Scooterscooty Two Spare Wheels Divyangjan

criteria.description: Domicile of Chhattisgarh
Age between 18 and 40 years
Possess a valid driving license
Monthly income of parents/guardians up to Rs.20,000/-
Disability certificate of 60% or more, UDID certificate
Regular students need attested copy from Head of Institution
Disability certificate of 70% or more, UDID certificate
Affidavit of the applicant regarding the certified pay-sleep, workplace etc. from the head of the office concerned to the handicapped working in employment.
Copy of payment of self-employment loan bill and certified copy from the head of the concerned bank/department/institution.

description: There will be an increase in the standard of living and economic prosperity of the handicapped. The vision of an inclusive society will be created through this scheme. This scheme will prove to be a milestone for the empowerment, inclusion and social justice of the Divyangjan of the state and it will be an innovation initiative at the national level. To provide equal opportunity to the differently-abled to stand on their feet in every field (going to remote destinations and work according to their capacity), thereby creating new employment by increasing their educational level and means of livelihood and raising the standard of living and economic To bring strength.
title: Motorized Tricycle Battery Operated Supply Scheme Divyangjan

criteria.description: If tricycle is already available then at least 03 years time interval will be necessary.
If pre-motorized tricycle (battery operated) is available then at least 10 years time lag will be required.
If petrol powered two wheeler scooter/scooty (with two spare wheels) is already available, a minimum time span of 15 years will be required.
Candidate must be a native of Chhattisgarh.
The minimum age of the candidate should not be more than 16 years and maximum 55 years.
Certified disability certificate of 60% or more, UDID certificate.
The monthly income of the parents/guardians from all sources should be up to Rs.20,000/- in case of self or dependent.
For regular students, it will be mandatory to have an attested copy from the head of the concerned school/college/university.
Certified Disability Certificate of 70 percent or more, UDID certificate.
Affidavit of the applicant regarding pay sleep, workplace etc., certified by the head of the office concerned to the handicapped working in employment.
Beneficiaries of Chhattisgarh Disabled Finance and Development Corporation, who are capable of running motorized tricycles, will be benefited according to special priority.
Copy of payment of self-employment loan bill and certified copy from the concerned bank / department (corporation) / head of the institution.

If the applicant does not fall in the above two categories, then after thorough examination regarding his application, the Joint / Deputy Director, District Office of Social Welfare will be presented to the concerned District Collector for decision. The recommendation of the District Collector will be mandatory in the case.

description:
Scheme Name :-  "Aprajita" (Shelter Home for Mental ill Women).
Objective of Shelter Home Management :- The department is strongly committed to the care, protection, security and rehabilitation of the disabled. There is no denying the fact that mentally ill persons are looked down upon and are abused and mistreated. They are also abandoned by many families. Such mentally ill women need special care, protection and security. Under Section 5 (2) (b) of the Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act, 2016, the appropriate government will endeavor to. All basic facilities like accommodation/food/medical/legal aid/daily activities items etc. will be provided to the mentally ill women through the home. Initially this centre will operate in district Raipur. After that it will be conducted in the divisional headquarters or other districts as per the requirement.



Execution Agency :-   The residential operation of the shelter home operated under district Raipur will be done by the Directorate of Social Welfare. In future, as per the need, after getting the approval from the government for the establishment of such homes in other districts, they will be operated by the concerned district social welfare office.



Beneficiary of the Home and Admission Process :- 

Residential assistance will be provided to adult mentally ill women through the Home.
This center will remain operational 24X7.
Any woman who considers herself mentally ill and wants to be admitted for treatment may make a request to the psychiatrist in charge of the shelter home and accordingly the woman may be admitted on the basis of the recommendation of the psychiatrist in charge of the home.
On the basis of the written recommendation of a psychiatrist, women will be able to enter the shelter home. It will be necessary to inform the police station under whose jurisdiction the home operates, of every woman entering. It will be necessary to inform the police station under whose jurisdiction the home operates, of every women entering. It will be necessary to inform the police station under whose jurisdiction the  home operates, of every women entering.
Any mentally ill woman who does not express or is unable to express her will for admission in the shelter home, may be admitted to the shelter home on the application made in that behalf by any relative or friend of that woman when the in-charge of the home. The psychiatrist is satisfied that it is necessary to do so in the interest of the mentally ill woman./li>
Regarding admission other instructions will be under the provision given in the Mental Health Care Act 2017.
